noshi is a free Operating System and Hardware Information library for Nim.

It was inspired by [OSHI](https://oshi.ooo/).

## Supported Platforms

* [ ] Windows - working
* [ ] Linux

## Usage

Install it use nimble:

```shell
nimble install https://github.com/lzw-723/noshi
```

## Develop

To develop noshi, you need:

* git
* nim >= 1.6
